about.description: Hello. Im James, a full stack developer based in Manila, Philippines. I love to build things from the scratch. I started my career as a junior front end developer as an on the job trainee. After graduating, I continue my career as a front end developer for 2 years. After 2 years of being a front end developer I levelled up my career and decided to learn backend. As of now, I worked as a web developer. Aside from coding, I love to play basketball and go outside with my family or friends.

works.title: Web Developer
description: Worked with a team of developers to developed  a web application that helped the company to transition to paperless for purchase requests and purchase request approval process.
Write clean, optimise and manageable code for our internal projects.
Communicate and collaborate with team of developers, designers and project manager on a daily basis.

Maintained and improved existing web apps.
Communicate and collaborate with team of developers, designers and project manager on a daily basis.

works.title: Junior Software Engineer (Intern)
description: Worked as a junior software engineer and helped senior developer in developing various web application.
